sentence.Network_en: His jokes were long and unamusing.

list.abs: 娱乐-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 给...提供娱乐 amuse 非娱乐性的 unamused 大公共娱乐场 coliseum.

auth_sentence.content: This is because we all understand that a joke is a joke, however insulting, unfair, foul, tasteless and unamusing.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is because we all understand that a joke is a joke, however insulting, unfair, foul, tasteless and unamusing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is because we all understand that a joke is a joke, however insulting, unfair, foul, tasteless and unamusing.

auth_sentence.content: There came tedious meanderings in Snoopyland with the unhilarious bird Woodstock and the unamusing beagle Spike.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There came tedious meanderings in Snoopyland with the unhilarious bird Woodstock and the unamusing beagle Spike.
